author: jmhsieh
msg: HBASE-9142 Mutation#getFamilyMap() return type change between HBase 94 and 96 breaks downstream apps
For 0.95/0.96, we need to preserve the getFamilyMap signature through a deprecation cycle.  The new
method needs to be present alongside the old in 0.95, so we rename the method with the new signature
to getFamilyCellMap() in both trunk and 0.95, and restore a deprecated version of the old in 0.95.

author: cnauroth
msg: HADOOP-9831. Make checknative shell command accessible on Windows. Contributed by Chris Nauroth.

author: hiranya
msg: Passing top level synapse properties to the AbstractRegistry, so SYNAPSE_HOME can be resolved proeprly by the subclasses. Fix applied from SYNAPSE-774
